description: An examination of the horror film genre, primarily in American cinema. Psychosocial determinants; spectatorship, affect, and identification; the uncanny and the monstrous; the body; abjection. Films by Hitchcock, Romero, Friedkin, De Palma, Carpenter, Kubrick, Cronenberg, Demme, and others.
title: CANCELLED
extra_flags: YC FILM Stud: Critical Studies
